subject: Cavorting in Castile
event: Haven't had much opportunity to get online of late, but Parris has joined me and we're having a great time.  I'm posting this from a castle, an astonishing parador in Castile.  My publisher has been taking very good care of us, and tomorrow is my first Spanish event, the signing at Generacion X in Madrid.  We're expecting a big turnout of my Spanish readers.  See you there.
